en.header: What should you do when you identify a buying signal from your customer?
en.klf: Once you have received a buying signal, don't waste time: ask for the order! Buying signals can be obvious or subtle, but once you have identified one, it is time to act.
en.tips: Pay attention to nonverbal clues. If the customer is sitting, open arms indicate receptiveness. Leaning forward and listening carefully shows interest. Body language plays a part in buying signals.
en.choice_Nks9IC4VD: Wait for another one to be sure

fr.header: Que devez-vous faire lorsque vous identifiez un signal d'achat de votre client?
fr.klf: Une fois que vous avez reçu un signal d'achat, ne perdez pas de temps: demandez la commande! Les signaux d'achat peuvent être évidents ou subtils, mais une fois que vous en avez identifié un, il est temps d'agir.
fr.tips: Faites attention aux indices non verbaux. Si le client est assis, les bras ouverts indiquent sa réceptivité. Se pencher en avant et écouter attentivement montre son intérêt. Le langage du corps joue un rôle dans l'achat de signaux.

de.header: What should you do when you identify a buying signal from your customer?
de.klf: Once you have received a buying signal, don't waste time: ask for the order! Buying signals can be obvious or subtle, but once you have identified one, it is time to act.
de.tips: Pay attention to nonverbal clues. If the customer is sitting, open arms indicate receptiveness. Leaning forward and listening carefully shows interest. Body language plays a part in buying signals.
de.choice_Nks9IC4VD: Wait for another one to be sure
